abstract: Signals whether or not the data fetch is successful.
overview:
## Discussion

The Boolean value passed into the `close` method signals whether or not the data fetch succeeded. If true is passed, then those indexes are marked internally as loaded, and a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/datasource/datasource/3192119-loadindexes] event for these indexes won't be invoked again. If false is passed, the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/datasource/datasource/3192119-loadindexes] event will be invoked only when those indexes are needed again.

# close

**Instance Method**

Signals whether or not the data fetch is successful.

## Declaration

```swift
void close(
    in Boolean success
);
```

## Discussion

The Boolean value passed into the `close` method signals whether or not the data fetch succeeded. If true is passed, then those indexes are marked internally as loaded, and a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/datasource/datasource/3192119-loadindexes] event for these indexes won't be invoked again. If false is passed, the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/datasource/datasource/3192119-loadindexes] event will be invoked only when those indexes are needed again.
title: close
